body:
@danmane
Could you explain how to inject a matplotlib plot into an image_summary. I have tried out a million things but I don't manage to.
So far I've got an image as a numpy array, but then how do I add it? Here are my last thoughts:

```
for ... training loop ...:
    sess.run(train_op)
    img = create_image(...)
    sum = tf.image_summary("foo",
                           np.reshape(img, [1, img.shape[0], img.shape[1], img.shape[2]]))
    summary_writer.add_summary(sum)
    summary_writer.flush()
```
